attributes.description:
This is the very popular 2020 Legend 50 Toyota Hilux 2.8 GD-6 Automatic 4x4 Xtra Cab with full Toyota service history, tow bar, roll bar, tonneau cover, black leather interior and reverse camera. Factory warranty is still active with Toyota. Come and have a look what beauty this is having done no off-roading. Contact us today for a test drive before it is gone!

MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient.

attributes.description: Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why AGG Westrand offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery. You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through AGG Westrand Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today. Maintenance plan until 30/05/2024

attributes.description: Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short-change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non-refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another non-refundable deposit to secure it further. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
